title: Brick Breaker Endless
description: Fun filled Addictive Bricks breaker Game, "Brick Breaker Endless" is out with excitement and fun. This Challenging Breaking neon bricks with firing balls will blow out your stress. Break as many bricks as possible and achieve high score. Shoot the Bricks in proper angle to break more bricks and target power-ups to gain better scores. Features: - Endless Gameplay - Free to play - Neon colored tiles - Special Power Ups
instructions: - Hold the Canon to fire the balls - Aim at proper angles for breaking more bricks - Don't let the bricks to reach bottom

title: Move the Pin
description: Move The Pin is interesting physics game - this is a game where you need to push back the pins to help the colored balls collect the gray balls to make them also colored and get into the transparent flask. There is 30 different levels so have fun.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Crossy Chicken
description: Crossy Chicken is an arcade game with the gameplay similar to the classic Frogger game. In Crossy Chicken game you have to dodge traffic, hop across logs, evade trains and collect coins. Make sure you don’t stay still for too long or you’re toast! Don’t forget to unlock exciting new characters with your hard earnt coins! Use the arrow keys to move sideways or forward. Don’t stand in the way of upcoming cars, or other incoming objects. You can also use gamepad. Play It Now! Features: - Hypercasual gameplay - Touch, keyboard and gamepad support - Including 3D Assets.
instructions: You have to dodge traffic, hop across logs, evade trains and collect coins.

title: Rally Point
description: Offroad racing with the fastest cars - equipped with unlimited nitro. Be aware though! Too much nitro will overheat your car with explosive consequences... Can you finish in time to unlock new cars and tracks?
instructions: [ArrowKeys] / [WASD] - Steer. [Shift] / [X] - Drift [Space] / [Z] - Nitro

title: Sinal Game
description: In this mathematical game the player must observe the mathematical equation and answer which is the correct operator of the equations (addition, subtraction, division and multiplication). The goal is to reach the highest score possible in 60 seconds. Hits add 2 to the score, but misses decrease it by 1.
instructions: Mouse or touch to select the operators.

title: Circle Rotate
description: Circle Rotate is a puzzle game where you need to rotate the ring which has a small opening on one side. White balls should pass through that opening and reach the center of the ring. The opening is narrow and you have to adjust it well to go through it with the white ball. You have the opportunity for a few mistakes, but be careful and try to pass more balls through the opening.
instructions: Use left and right arrow keys or tap on the screen to rotate the ring.

title: Colored Water & Pin
description: Colored Water & Pin is a free online game from genre of puzzle and logic games. In this game you have a total of 30 levels. You need to start from the first one and to unlock the next level. Remove the pins and try to fill the flasks with the appropriate colored water.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Imposter Killer
description: You need to quickly find the impostors and kill them. Do not appear within sight of your replacement, or your life will be in danger! Don't forget to use gold to buy new characters and enhance your personal abilities!
instructions: Swipe to play.

title: Rugby 2021
description: Rugby 2021 is fun addictive hyper casual sports game.Tap and Swipe to run throw the ball to Team Mate and reach destination by avoid obstacles and opponents .Have fun
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Falling Babble
description: Falling Babble is a game in which you need to control the ball to destroy other items. Touch the screen, if the white ball is on the enemy again touch the screen. The game needs skill and attention.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Happy Milk Glass
description: Happy Milk Glass – is a game in which you need to draw with a shovel the optimal way to move milk to fill a bucket. 30 different levels; Physics game; Touch and Mouse control;
instructions: Touch and Mouse control; Draw with a shovel the optimal way to move milk to fill a bucket.

title: Hidden Wrench In Trucks
description: This is hidden objects game with trucks. This game offers you six levels to play. Start with the first level and find the ten hidden wrench for the given playing time. If you succeed in that you will move to the next level. Each next level you play will reduce the playing time by 10 seconds. Try to pass all the levels and win in this game. Hidden object games are always interesting and fun to play.
instructions: Use mouse to click on hidden objects.

title: Super Archer
description: Platform adventure and action game, where the archer must cross the monster valley, where he encounters many challenges. Collect all the stars in each stage. Super Archer is a super fun and challenging 2D side-scroller game.
instructions: Use Arrows and X to attack or touch buttons on your devices.

title: Clock Challenge
description: This game has a simple gameplay. The clock hand is rotating and all you have to do is to touch or click on the screen when it reaches the designated number or hour. Also if you click on the right time, then that number will be pronounced, so this game can be also amazing for teaching kids how to read the clock and its numbers.
instructions: Touch on mobile device or mouse on PC

title: Stop Them All
description: Stop Them All is a fascinating casual game. The controls couldn’t be simpler. All you have to do is tap the Activate button when you want the trap to start its action or movement.
instructions: Click or tap to control.

title: Snowball Throw
description: In this game the player starts with 6 snowballs to throw. For each throw the distance is calculated, and the total score is added. Power-ups can help the player during the game, like Additional lives (+3), Silver star (adds score in 1000) and Golden Star (adds score in 5000).
instructions: Tap to throw the snowball.

title: Mining To Riches
description: This is a very fun puzzle mining game, the player use is very simple and easy just control the mining machine continuously mine to get balls and earn more balls to buy better cars.
instructions: Swipe to play game.

title: Ninja Frog
description: Ninja Frog is platform game similar as Super Mario. The hero at this game is a ninja frog. Control the frog through platform. Crash boxes and collect strawberries. Tap the enemies on the top to destroy them. Avoid spikes and blades and all other obstacles. Jump on the long distances and try to finish the level. There is five interesting levels. Take the ninja frog to this journey and have fun.
instructions: Use arrow keys or tap the icons on the screen.

title: Giant Push!
description: Conquer the field. Use your minion army to the victory! Find the best angle to emit your army to push middle platform and beat the opponents! Use joystick controls to aim and hold up your finger. Your cannon will start to emit your army.
instructions: Hold & Drag by mouse to aim. Release moust button to emit soldiers.

title: Construction Set
description: Lego games are popular all over the world. You can use all kinds of small parts to form incredible three-dimensional puzzles, such as cars, bicycles, houses, etc. If you are a big fan of Lego, don't miss the Construction Set! There are many unopened Lego toys on the shelf. Your task is to unpack, take out all the parts and follow the instructions to join together. You can choose your favorite Lego or share this game with your friends!
instructions: Click to play.

title: Fish Rescue! Pin Pull
description: Fish rescue! is a puzzle, kids games with more than 50 million download on play store now available to play in html5 version with more than 15+ levels. Rescue the fish pulling Pin and kill the predator and survive. Be aware the game is too addictive.
instructions: Pull the pin and help the fish.

title: Solar System
description: Solar System With the Solar System game, discover our solar system in a fun way from your phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids Solar System Com o jogo Solar System descobre o nosso sistema solar de forma divertida a partir do telemóvel, tablet ou computador. Jogo desenvolvido por: Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the correct answer.

title: Mini Golf 2D
description: Mini Golf 2D it is a very fun and accurate game. Your goal is to get the ball to the hole !. Will you be able to complete the 20 levels in just one move?
instructions: Use the mouse or touch to interact

title: Join Pusher 3D
description: Join Pusher 3D is a fascinating running game. You are able to recruit your pushers as many as possible while running. Meanwhile, you would better be cautious when shifting your running courses. You need to act by the principle of saving your pushers. Enjoy the game!
instructions: Click to control.

title: Super Frog
description: Super Frog is an excellent platform game. Play in the classic Super Mario style! With 8 incredible levels Jump on enemies' heads to destroy, don't let them touch you so you don't lose their lives. For every 30 fruits collected, you regain a lost life
instructions: tap the arrow keys, or tap the screen (mobile device) Eliminate all monsters and collect all fruits

title: Math Memory
description: This is a memory game in which the player must match the pairs with 16 cards according math operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
instructions: Mouse and touchscreen

title: Fly THIS!
description: Fly THIS! is an addictive game of explosive airplane action that will challenge your inner air traffic controller. The sequel to the award winning Conduct THIS! takes players to the skies in a race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by drawing flight paths and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles. Mastering air traffic has never looked this good and been this fun. Upgrade your airport and purchase new planes for your fleet as your little airline expands its reach to far away destinations. • Control planes in a beautiful 3D world • Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone • Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new airplanes • Progress through exotic islands with unique themes • Fantastic soundtrack by composer Mikkel Gemzøe • From the Award winning team that brought you Conduct THIS!
instructions: Press on planes and drag to create a path.

title: Jump cube
description: This is an endless isometric runner game, with 5 characters to choose fromFeatures:- Isometric Game- Endless Runner- Change your character for more fun- Characters locked until certain highscores achieved
instructions: Tap to Jump

title: Pick Me Up Taxi
description: Have you ever wanted to be a ride share driver? Pick up and drop off customers to earn money and level up. Explore the world and discover new monuments. How To Play: - Tap and hold to drive - Release to brake - Avoid crashing - Collect cash and unlock cool cars
instructions: Have you ever wanted to be a ride share driver? Pick up and drop off customers to earn money and level up. Explore the world and discover new monuments. How To Play: - Tap and hold to drive - Release to brake - Avoid crashing - Collect cash and unlock cool cars

title: Chaotic Ball
description: Chaotic Ball is a game where you need to collect the stars with small orange ball. But the ball is all chaotic. She make chaotic movies. So you need to control the ball and to go to the stars. There will be big balls and you need to avoid them too. If you hit with small ball into big blue ball the game will over. You can crash three times before game will over. Collect more stars as you can and get the best score.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Hardest Game Ever
description: Are you ready to try the hardest game ever? Work your way through 60 incredibly hard levels! High attention and concentration will make playing games easier. You are red square, avoid the blue circles and collect yellow circles. Once you have collected all the yellow circles go to green area to complete the level.
instructions: Arrow Keys or MOUSE. (Joystick in the setting section.)

title: Stair Run 3D
description: Climb your stairs to avoid all of the obstacles in this fun online game. Try to complete each level by reaching the finish line. Climb your remaining stairs to obtain a bonus. How high of a score can you achieve?
instructions: Click or tap to build your stairs. Avoid all obstacles.

title: Rolling The Ball
description: A very fun game, to roll the ball. Your objective is simple to roll the ball in the hole with just 1 movement. Will you be able to complete all the challenges without losing a single time?
instructions: Use touch to launch the ball

title: Bamboo Run
description: Bamboo Run is fun addictive adventure hypercasual game.Swipe or move mouse To Collect Bamboo and Make High Tall Bamboo Tower to Reach Destination Have Fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Ninja Warrior Shadow of Last Samurai
description: A shadow ninja adventure game blending gorgeous graphics, innovative gameplay, and intense boss battles within the palm of your hands. Experience shadow ninja warrior adventure in medieval japan with hack n slash and rpg elements. An action RPG samurai fighting game where you will take revenge as a brave shadow warrior assassin. One of the best 3D ninja games where you experience a sword fighting Japanese adventure of a legend ninja assassin with console quality graphics. This is a ninja fighting game where a legend rises in medieval Japan to unleash his ninja abilities. Upgrade your skills and fight as a legend samurai ninja warrior with corrupted forces to conquer menacing territory. Vanquish powerful bosses in battle arena and ultimately become a legend ninja samurai warrior. For the fans of ultimate ninja fight, samurai warrior, medieval legend, and ninja games, this is an extraordinary action filled 3D adventure. Background The story belongs to Tochi, a land of secrets. Takashi is the son of Arashi, a Japanese ninja fighter with ninjutsu training who gains ultimate glory by defeating the corruption of Tochi. Takashi takes revenge for his people. Shadow Ninja Adventure Game Using divine resistance coming from Arashi family, takashi participates in challenging battles. He uses swords, axes, hammers, and shurikens, to defeat monsters in this action rpg. The shadow ninja samurai assassin fights to destroy darkness and becomes an unstoppable stealth master continuously improving monster hunter skills alongside. He then fights in battleground of Japanese lands. Exploration Explore huge maps and secrets paths. Discover various rewards at different locations. Inventory System and Character Upgrade Player can upgrade character, enhance skills and store items in inventory. Intense Boss Battles Various kind of unique and challenging boss battles. Bosses includes beasts, witches, and ninjas. You can fight with enemies face to face or become a stealth master, it is your choice. Variety of Weapons Equip different type of weapons to fight with your own style. Each weapon has its own attributes. The decision of selecting the right weapon for a particular fight is important. Costumes Equip from a variety of traditional fighter costumes. Are you ready to face challenges in a console quality shadow ninja arashi fighting adventure? This is time to explore what its like to fight in medieval age with ninjutsu skills. With many wonderful levels, this strategy game lets you become an ultimate legend ninja samurai assassin. Ending chaos in this ninja adventure is in the hands of your blade warrior. This is not any ordinary dark fantasy rpg dragon conquest, this is a real revenge fight of a Japanese fighter to purify the evil lands. This real ninja assassin warrior game is one of the best monster hunter action rpg adventure games. Prepare for the battles using your ninjutsu skills. Try this experience on mobile.
instructions: easy to play multiworlds

title: Roof Rails Online
description: Can you imagine parkour on the roof? This is undoubtedly a thrilling thing. In the game Roof Rails Online, you will have the opportunity to try this dangerous sport. Use a wooden pole to keep your balance while collecting blocks on the platform to increase the length of the pole. There is a lot of snow on the platform. Pay attention to keep your body stable and don't leave the scope of the roof. It is worth noting that you still have the opportunity to collect a lot of gems. It depends on your accumulation when you are about to reach the end. Are you ready?
instructions: Drag the mouse to play.

title: Unicorns Jumper
description: An addicted hypercasual game, simple to control, nice design, fun and relax-able. Jump as high as possible to unlock more cute characters. How high can you reach! PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap on the left half of the screen to jump left. Tap on the right half of the screen to jump right.

title: Bouncy GO
description: Bouncy GO is a hyper-casual game where you have to avoid obstacles in order to pass levels, you should hold the mouse button for movement and stop when there's an obstacle.
instructions: Hold the mouse button for movement and stop when there's an obstacle.

title: Happy Cups 2
description: Happy Cups is a funny logical kids game. The goal in this game is to fill the cup with liquid, but be careful not to spill the liquid from the cup. Therefore you need to open the tap to flow exactly to fill the cup. You will fill different types of cups. And they will all collect different amounts of liquid. Estimate how much liquid you will need for each cup and fill the cups at all levels.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Smart Pin Ball
description: Smart Pin Ball – where you need to push back the pins to help the colored balls collect the gray balls to make them also colored and get into the transparent flask. One Touch gameplay; 30 different levels; Physics game; Touch and Mouse control; FULL HD Images.
instructions: Push back the pins Make balls colored and get into the transparent flask.

title: Change Square
description: Change Square is a puzzle game where the ball will touch the square. It's that simple. But the ball and the square must be the same color. So you have to click on the screen to change the color of the square and get the color that is the same as the ball. If the square and the ball are a different color when they are touched the game will over.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Three Arcade
description: Three Arcade – is a game that includes three small games, these games require precision and attention. Mixture of games which are intense to play. Aim and shoot the ball which has to hit the yellow ball. Sliding blocks with alternate colors which has to match the ball color to hit. Last one is the obstacles are moving around, just plan out the time passing through to join the two balls. Play these games and obtain highscore. Enjoy these arcades and have fun!.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Lick Them all
description: Can you do the right reflection in speed moving? Lick Them all is a challenge game to test this skill. It is also easy to control, just need to hold and release your finger at the right time. Lick all things except for the dangerous ones, such as avoiding poop, ice, hot spice, and so on. Oh, it's really not easy as it looks. Are you ready to challenge?
instructions: Tap and hold to play.

title: Stacker Tower
description: Pile up all the boxes! Revive the old-school fun of playing a classic tower stacking game on your device. Let go of all your troubles by indulging yourself in a challenging and addictive box stacker game. From extremely appealing game graphics and appealing sound effects to stunning motion effects and challenging gaming action, this physics bases box stacking game is all about strategy and patience involved in balancing the boxes over one another. Take off the burden of worries off your shoulders by channeling your energies into a highly addictive box game. Play it now!
instructions: Simple 1 touch or click controls. Just tap or click to make the boxes fall and stack them up.

title: Ladder Climber
description: If you believe you can think quickly and move quickly at the same time, try Ladder Climber to see how far you can get. While this game appears to be easy, you must be cautious and prepared because it will prove to be difficult. This game is very addictive, so you will undoubtedly spend hours playing it. So get out there and play, relieve tension, kill boredom, and have a great time. Don't worry, it's completely free. By the way, you can challenge your family or friends and see who can get more steps. Enjoy!Game Objective: Your goal is to climb as far up the ladder as possible by deciding if you need to swap hands or climb. Since some of the ladder's steps are cut in half and shift, you'll also need to figure out the best pacing.Features:- Simple Gameplay- Cool design and graphics- Suitable sound effects
instructions: Tap on Bottom right button to Climb.Tap on Bottom left button to Swap Hands.

title: Ropeman
description: Ropeman is an arcade-style old-school game in which you try to climb the ropes which are coming from the sky with a man. The game has two game modes as slide and tap. You can have a consistent climbing option with a slide option and you can have a health bar with a tap gaming option. Pick one and challenge a friend and let the fun begin!
instructions: Move left: "LEFT-ARROW" Move right: "RIGHT-ARROW" Restart: "SPACE"

title: Walking Monsters
description: At this shooting zombie game you will be alone on field surrounded with zombies. Only the gun in your hand is your friend. You will be by attack from all sides. Zombies will come to you. They will go from the front and the back. You will have to defend yourself on both sides. But there will also be danger from heaven. From there you will be attacked by zombie bats and other creatures. Try to kill them all and get as far as you can.
instructions: Use mouse to aim and shoot.

title: Commando Boat
description: Commando! Drive your speed boat behind enemy lines. Avoid incoming obstacles such as river mines, tree logs, rocks and other boats. Shoot and destroy obstacles with bullets. This is a new and reimagined casual shoot em up game featuring a marine theme.
instructions: Drive your speedboat behind enemy lines

title: Love Tester Deluxe
description: Always wanted to know if two people are a match? Enter the names in this Love Tester and find out if there is real love between them! In this 'Deluxe' edition you can also see how much the couple scores on: Compatibility, Chemistry, Friendship and ofcourse Passion! Check wbich of your classmates, colleagues, friends make the perfect couple!
instructions: Enter the names of the couple you want to love test. Hit the 'Love Test!' button and to see your love score percentage. Then hit the other buttons to see the rest of the scores. Hit the 'Final Results' button to see the score overview

title: High Shoes
description: Dare you to run on stilts! Run on stilts and avoid obstacles carefully. Try to make highest stilts as you can. How far can you go? A funny game is ready for you!
instructions: Run on stilts and avoid obstacles carefully. Try to make highest stilts as you can
